    \foreach \angle in {0,180,...,360}{
    \begin{tikzpicture}[scale=2,line cap=round,line join=round]
    
    \tikzset{
        3d/polyhedron/.cd,
        fore layer=foreground,
        back layer=background, 
        fore/.append style={fill opacity=0.7},
        back/.append style={fill opacity=0.7}
    }

    \begin{scope}[3d/install view={phi=\angle,psi=20,theta=70}]
        \tikzset{
            % name prefix=Va,%<- used for all vertices
            3d/define vertices/.expanded={\lstV},
            3d/polyhedron/create faces from vertex list/.expanded={\lstFaces}
        }
    \end{scope}
    \end{tikzpicture}}
